original_text: And as he was worshiping in the house of Nisroch his god, Adrammelech and Sharezer, his sons, struck him down with the sword. And after they escaped into the land of Ararat, Esarhaddon his son reigned in his place.
korean_text: 자기 신 니스록의 신전에서 경배할 때에 그의 아들 아드람멜렉과 사레셀이 그를 칼로 죽이고 아라랏 땅으로 도망하였으므로 그의 아들 에살핫돈이 이어 왕이 되니라

sentences.original_text: And as he was worshiping in the house of Nisroch his god,
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 니스록 자기 신의 집에서 예배할 때에,

sentences.original_text: struck him down with the sword.
And after they escaped into the land of Ararat,
Esarhaddon his son reigned in his place.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아들 에사르하돈이 그의 자리에 왕이 되었습니다.
